participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Determined and energetic, Aarav is passionate about sports and fitness. He has a competitive spirit and enjoys pushing his limits.
participant_1.background: I'm a gold medalist Olympian. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. My favorite color is yellow. I love Italian food and garlic bread. I workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is nurturing and sociable, with a love for teaching and the outdoors. She enjoys creating a positive atmosphere for her students.
participant_2.background: For vacation, I enjoy time at the beach. My favorite band is Up and I got to see them in concert once. I'm an elementary school teacher. My parents were also teachers.
